Header.title: Health Block
Header.head: Create your own Digital Health Block
Header.paragraph: Health Block - Key to your digital healthcare journey.

About.paragraph: We focus on the data security, to make the patients information easy to access by doctors and insurance companies for verifications in a secure way without any data theft.
Why: These requirements paved way to go for blockchain technology.
We also make it simple to use with our user friendly environment.
People get their unique ID to store their medical records then they have the power to access and share their details.

Form.signup: Get Started with us today! Create your account
Form.login: Great day! Login to your account

Features.title: Digital Health Records
Features.text: Access your information right from admission to treatment and discharge in a paperless manner

Features.title: Personal Health Records (PHR)
Features.text: Access and link your Personal Health Records (PHR) with Health ID to create longitudinal health history.

Features.title: Easy sign up
Features.text: Create your Health ID using only your basic information alongwith Mobile Number, or Aadhaar.

Features.title: Secure and Private
Features.text: Built with robust security and encryption mechanisms and no information is shared without your consent.
